data.name: Tower of Time Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Downloadable soundtrack for Tower of Time (mp3 format):

C - City
E - Exploration
F - Fight

C1 The City of Broken Stones (04:52)
C2 Reclaiming the Forgotten (05:35)
C3 Five Minutes of Sunlight (05:46)
E1 Into the Tower (05:28)
E2 Lost Knowledge (05:30)
E3 Among the Friends (08:08)
E4 A Place of Wonders (07:27)
E5 A Candle in the Darkness (05:15)
E6 The Long Descent (05:23)
E7 Tales of the Past (05:40)
F1 Drums of Battle (05:10)
F2 The Swarm (05:29)
F3 The Rain of Steel (05:49)
F4 Strength in Unity (05:10)
F5 Surrounded (04:29)
F6 Always Victorious (05:04)
F7 Against the Odds (05:20)

data.short_description: Soundtrack for Tower of Time - close to one hour of climatic music composed by Dawid Majewski.
